actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 95-508.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on Armed Services, the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources, the Committee on Environment and Public Works, and the Committee on Foreign Relations for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: Amends Senate Resolution 142 (95th Congress) to increase authorized expenditures by the Senate Committee on Armed Services. Amends Senate Resolution 158 (95th Congress) to increase authorized expenditures by the Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Amends Senate Resolution 157 (95th Congress) to increase authorized expenditures by the Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works. Amends Senate Resolution 156 (95th Congress) to increase authorized expenditures by the Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on Armed Services, the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources, the Committee on Environment and Public Works, and the Committee on Foreign Relations for inquiries and investigations.
